r.d: PHP extension for compression and decompression with Brotli library.
r.n: - add: BROTLI_VERSION_TEXT and BROTLI_VERSION_NUMBER constants - change!: remove length argument for brotli_uncompress() - remove: BROTLI_LIB_VERSION that is no longer needed - fix: memory leak - refactor: change library version acquisition in ZEND_MINFO_FUNCTION to constant - refactor: zend parse parameters sets the return value on error to false
